0011111011111010 1001010010000010 0 -> sum: 1101001101111100, cout: 0
0111000010001001 1000111110010111 1 -> sum: 0000000000100001, cout: 1
0101010101000001 1010101010001011 0 -> sum: 1111111111001100, cout: 0
0110011010000011 0000001111111000 1 -> sum: 0110101001111100, cout: 0
1111001000100010 1111000101001010 1 -> sum: 1110001101101101, cout: 1
0011001001110110 1010010001011101 0 -> sum: 1101011011010011, cout: 0
